history.content:
I am applying to various graduate programs (including program at Berkeley) that have different due dates and different portals to upload or request upload of letters of rec. I don't want my recommenders to be inundated with emails for each program I am applying to. 

I found this online 'Dossier' by Interfolio: https://account.interfolio.com/signup. Wondering if anybody has experience with this or just my situation in general? Thanks.
history.subject: Managing letters of rec for post grad programs
